install.name: Redirect to Edit Profile
install.author: Team Joomlaxi
install.description: This extension can redirect user on edit profile page when jomsocial profile field is empty. User can be forced to complete profile before he goes anywhere else. Or you can redirect him once on login. This plugin can also check for Not-Required field, if mentioned in backend.

param.name: whenredirect
param.label: When to redirect user
param.description: Select 'Just After login' when you want to redirect only after login else select 'Everytime'.

param.name: whichfield
param.label: For which fields
param.description: Select 'All' if you want to check completness of all field else select 'Only required filed' if you want that only required field should complete.

param.name: message
param.label: Write message
param.description: Write Message here to display when user is redirected forcefully to edit profile page
